pullRequest.title: Updating azure-communication-administration README with a few samples
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added sample code for the below APIs (more to follow), this will be reused while giving reference in the Readme.md based on the initial template created here - https://skype.visualstudio.com/SCC/_wiki/wikis/SCC.wiki/11632/SDK-ReadMe-Template-(in-progress)

PhoneNumberClientBuilder
listAllSupportedCountries
listAllPhoneNumbers
listPhonePlanGroups
listPhonePlans
getPhonePlanLocationOptions
getAllAreaCodes

commit.message: Updating javadoc with a few samples

nodes.bodyText: We should not need to import JUnit packages here.
This policy is not needed. Authentication will automatically be handled by the CommunicationClientCredential.
